Name: Kanu-No
Ingredients: 67.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
5 ml Lustau East India Solera Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The rum's sherry notes are heightened by the addition of port and sherry.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2007 by Mr Ueno at Star Bar, Ginza, Tokyo. Originally served straight-up.
